name: bolt-manager-01-02
description: Demo manageriale calcistica realizzata con Bolt.new

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp -r src/* build/ && cp -r src/pages build/pages && cp -r src/components build/components && cp -r bolt_src build/bolt_src
